name: Dystopia 3: Re-Birth of Anarchy
summary: Dystopia 3: Re-Birth of Anarchy is an 11 level WAD. It was one of the first WADs to exploit editing tricks discovered for the Doom engine, such as deep water and the famous double 3D bridge. While its gameplay was true to Doom II's style, the project's level of detail was revolutionary for its time, with levels containing custom textures, crashed spaceships, and elaborate architecture in varied environments, subtly referring to a self-contained story.
